property.name: idEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only a specific entry (identified by its entryId). @var string

property.name: idIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving few specific entries (string should include comma separated list of entryId strings). @var string

property.name: nameLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry names (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry names, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry names, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: nameEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries with a specific name. @var string

property.name: partnerIdEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were uploaded by/assigned to users of a specific Kaltura Partner (identified by Partner ID). @var int

property.name: partnerIdIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries within Kaltura network which were uploaded by/assigned to users of few Kaltura Partners (string should include comma separated list of PartnerIDs) @var string

property.name: userIdEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries, uploaded by/assigned to a specific user (identified by user Id). @var string

property.name: tagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry tags (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: tagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: tagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsLike
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It should include only one string to search for in entry tags set by an ADMIN user (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, set by an ADMIN user, while applying an OR logic to retrieve entries that contain at least one input string (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: adminTagsMultiLikeAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries. It could include few (comma separated) strings for searching in entry tags, set by an ADMIN user, while applying an AND logic to retrieve entries that contain all input strings (no wildcards, spaces are treated as part of the string). @var string

property.name: statusEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at a specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}. @var KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusNotEqual
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, not at a specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus}. @var KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, at few specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus} (comma separated). @dynamicType KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: statusNotIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving only entries, not at few specific {@link ?object=KalturaEntryStatus KalturaEntryStatus} (comma separated). @dynamicType KalturaEntryStatus

property.name: typeIn
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving entries of few {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} (string should include a comma separated list of {@link ?object=KalturaEntryType KalturaEntryType} enumerated parameters). @dynamicType KalturaEntryType

property.name: createdAtGreaterThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system after a specific time/date (standard timestamp format). @var int

property.name: createdAtLessThanOrEqual
property.description: This filter parameter should be in use for retrieving only entries which were created at Kaltura system before a specific time/date (standard timestamp format). @var int

property.name: searchTextMatchAnd
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within all of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags. @var string

property.name: searchTextMatchOr
property.description: This filter should be in use for retrieving specific entries while search match the input string within at least one of the following metadata attributes: name, description, tags, adminTags. @var string

action.name: updateLoginData
action.description: Update user password and email

param.name: newLoginId

action.name: resetPassword
action.description: Reset admin user password and send it to the users email address

action.name: setInitialPassword
action.description: Set initial users password

param.name: newPassword
param.description: new password to set

action.name: enableLogin
action.description: Enable the user to login with a loginId (email) and password.

action.name: disableLogin
action.description: Disallow user to login with an id/password. Passing either a loginId or a userId is allowed.

service.name: widget
service.description: widget service for full widget management

action.name: add
action.description: Add new widget, can be attached to entry or kshow SourceWidget is ignored.

action.name: update
action.description: Update exisiting widget

action.name: get
action.description: Get widget by id

action.name: clone
action.description: Add widget based on existing widget. Must provide valid sourceWidgetId

action.name: list
action.description: Retrieve a list of available widget depends on the filter given

service.name: xInternal
service.description: Internal Service is used for actions that are used internally in Kaltura applications and might be changed in the future without any notice.

action.name: xAddBulkDownload
action.description: Creates new download job for multiple entry ids (comma separated), an email will be sent when the job is done This sevice support the following entries: - MediaEntry - Video will be converted using the flavor params id - Audio will be downloaded as MP3 - Image will be downloaded as Jpeg - MixEntry will be flattend using the flavor params id - Other entry types are not supported Returns the admin email that the email message will be sent to

param.name: entryIds
param.description: Comma separated list of entry ids
